description: Detects enumeration of local network configuration
name: System Network Discovery - macOS
query: (process.executable:("\/usr\/sbin\/netstat" OR "\/sbin\/ifconfig" OR "\/usr\/sbin\/ipconfig" OR "\/usr\/libexec\/ApplicationFirewall\/socketfilterfw" OR "\/usr\/sbin\/networksetup" OR "\/usr\/sbin\/arp") OR (process.executable:"\/usr\/bin\/defaults" AND process.command_line:*read* AND process.command_line:*\/Library\/Preferences\/com.apple.alf*))
author: remotephone
oscd.community
